name: Bennett
desc: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Teachings of Resistance
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

materials.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
materials.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Resistance
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

materials.name: Silver Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Guide to Resistance
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

materials.desc:

materials.name: Silver Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Philosophies of Resistance
materials.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

materials.name: Golden Raven Insignia
materials.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

materials.name: Dvalin's Plume
materials.desc:
A feather from the tail of the Dragon of the East.
As a dragon's feather it has experienced more than a thousand years' worth of winds. One senses within it a yearning for freedom so strong that it could whip up a light breeze to rescue it from its current confines. Its former owner's recognition of you is what makes it content to stay in your hands.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

desc.text:
Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is...
<color=#ffd780>Tap/Press</color>
A single, swift flame strike that deals <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Hold (Short)</color>
Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level.
· Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> and launching opponents.
· Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> , but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy.
Bennett takes no damage from being launched.
An attack that combines Bennett's dreams and passion with Pyro. But passion is sometimes overblown, and Pyro sometimes blows over.

Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> , creating an Inspiration Field.
<color=#ffd780>Inspiration Field</color>
· If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP.
· If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK.
· Imbues characters within the AoE with <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> .
Benny's Adventure Team's adventures are always fraught with unexpected danger. However, Bennett is more inclined to call them "journeys full of wonder, excitement, and beauty."
Decreases <color=#ffd780>Passion Overload</color> 's CD by 20%.

Within the area created by <color=#ffd780>Fantastic Voyage</color> , <color=#ffd780>Passion Overload</color> takes on the following effects:
· CD is reduced by 50%.
· Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.
When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Agnidus Agate Sliver
materials.desc: Character Ascension Material.

materials.name: Windwheel Aster
materials.desc: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds."

materials.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
materials.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
materials.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

materials.name: Everflame Seed
materials.desc:
A seed that fuels the unending flames of the Pyro Regisvine. It emits Pyro energy as if it will burn all that has ever sprouted from the ground.
Endless desires flow among turbulent energy deep within the earth. What desire could steadily hold such fire to the plants and long so eagerly to bathe everything in unquenchable flames?

customize.text: Character Details
Character Introduction

<color=#ffd780>March 13, 2020</color>
"So long as you do the exact opposite of whatever Bennett does, your whole adventure will go over smoothly." — Advice from former Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild member Herman.
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/10156</color>
Voice Actor Announcement

<color=#ffd780>November 6, 2020</color>
Travelers, the voice artists for Bennett have been officially announced. Quick, go check it out!
<color=#80c0ff>X:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/x.com/GenshinImpact/status/1324682945882443776</color>
Birthday

<color=#ffd780>February 28, 2021</color>
In the Mondstadt Branch of the Adventurer’s Guild, a number of single and childless old adventurers have carefully raised Bennett as if he were their very own kin. Bennett has likewise played his part as a good son, calling each of these old adventurers “Dad.”
Taking care of all his aging dads who have no family has taken up most of Bennett’s time outside of adventuring
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/215946</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 28, 2021</color>
Happy Birthday, Bennett!
A day as lucky as this one is hard to come by!
Your wishes and company make it even better than the official celebration could ever be!
What say we go treasure hunting... You know, before it starts to rain...
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/215948</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 28, 2022</color>
"Traveler, thanks for your present! You've taken very good care of me all the time, and it's your kindness and goodwill towards me that has saved me from my bad luck. This is a very special Teyvat Charred Egg I made. Hehe... Come and try it!"
"Let Paimon try... The burnt parts are really delicious! This is the first time Paimon's tasted such a crispy Teyvat Charred Egg~"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/3560428</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 28, 2022</color>
My birthday? Ah... right. After all, it only happens once every four years. Only my dads used to give me presents...
Even if my birthday didn't happen this year, you still gave me a present, and you went through all the trouble to decorate the place with balloons, too!
Thank you! I really do count myself fortune to have you as a friend. It feels like my luck in future is looking up!
Wait... why did the string holding the balloon suddenly snap?
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/3560429</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 28, 2023</color>
"It's been a long time since I've had an adventure like this, Traveler!"
"Although I usually don't have the best luck, I feel very lucky to be spending my birthday with you!"
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/16651622</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 28, 2023</color>
My dads said that if I adventure in the wilds a few days before my birthday, I might be able to find some pretty awesome treasure.
But I've been out for a while and haven't seen a hint of treasure... Are you out here looking for treasure chests too?
Are these presents for me? Whoa! These flowers look amazing! And a toy figure! Did you make it yourself? That's incredible!
Ohhh... I get it now! My dads were right, I did find some pretty cool treasure today. Haha, thanks a lot!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/16651625</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 29, 2024</color>
"I wish... to not be too unlucky this year? Uhh, on second thoughts, scrap that. How about... I wish my dads all the best this year!"
"I'm sure your dads wish you all the best too, Bennett."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/25574179</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 29, 2024</color>
Wanna know what this is? Hehe, it's a birthday present from another member of Benny's Adventure Team!
As luck would have it, I just so happened to slip over, so it came in handy after all!
My dads are right, a birthday that only comes around once every four years is bound to be a day of unexpected good fortune!
Well, that's my partner calling, so I better be off! I wish you a lucky day too — hope you finally manage to find that huge pile of pinecones you're after!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/25574204</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 28, 2025</color>
"If everything goes according to plan, we should be able to catch this duck very soon... probably."
"...I'm hungry."
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/37334127</color>

<color=#ffd780>February 28, 2025</color>
The weather's great today! Let's go on an adventure, I found a route that will give us an amazing experience!
Ugh— Why is it raining all of a sudden when the sun is still shining so brightly? Is this what they call a sunshower?
Let's take shelter here for now. sigh My luck is still as bad as ever, huh?
You're saying that there'll be a rainbow after the sunshower? W—Which means we're really lucky! Just one sentence from you and now I'm all excited, that's amazing!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/37334128</color>

Thanks to Traveler, the official Genshin Twitter account (@Genshin_7) has surpassed 500,000 followers!
To show our gratitude, we're giving away 24 Genshin character Twitter icons!

Dear travelers, "Run! Sprint! The adventure begins!" The Genshin Impact × Keep charity online running event is now open.
<color=#ffacff>Miyoushe:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.miyoushe.com/ys/article/40635738</color>

desc.text:
Benny's Adventure Team is an exception to the norm in the Adventurers' Guild, Mondstadt Branch.
Initially, the team mechanism requiring at least 3 or 4 regulars in each team was set up to promote mutual support and prevent accidents.
As for Benny's Adventure Team, however, its only regular member has been Bennett himself.
The lack of team members essentially has everything to do with Bennett's infamous bad luck.
However, being the passionate adventurer he is, Bennett never feels lonely.
Well, maybe once or twice, sometimes...

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 2</color>
The adventurer Jack was the first victim of Benny's Adventure Team.
Just a few feet away from the treasure, an extremely rare Geo Turbulence occurred, tearing the ground apart and opening a bottomless chasm right before everyone's eyes.
"So close, yet so far... like love."
Jack only suffered minor injuries, but he was never the same as an adventurer thereafter; the event seemed to have left him with a broken heart.
Another member, Royce, heard someone shout "Heyo!" before losing consciousness in a huge explosion. The culprit, Klee, was sent to the confinement room for seven days for mistaking the cave the adventurers were still exploring in for a giant rabbit hole and blowing it up.
Heckler suffered from a severe bout of diarrhea for a week after joining the team. Although it turned out to be food poisoning, he insisted it was because of Bennett's bad luck.
"They'll be back! They're just... on leave. Please don't invalidate my team's registration with the Guild..."
Seeing Bennett beg and plead before her eyes, Katheryne sighed and decided to spare him the truth that his "teammates" had long jumped ship.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3</color>
There was once a predicament of incomparable despair.
A predicament that had all but swallowed an old adventurer.
The scorching flames scalded his skin, the deafening thunder almost ruptured his eardrums, and the hollering winds threatened to rip his soul from him.
At the end of his hellish journey, what awaited him was... a baby.
The old adventurer thought he was the first living thing to pass through this hell on earth. But how could he explain that which lay before him?
In that moment, it hit him, and he believed it to be true.
"This baby must be... a child abandoned by the world itself."
Though there were no mighty artifacts, jewelry, or gold, the old man's face did not seem disappointed in the slightest, for he regarded this baby, whose life hung by a mere thread, to be his treasure.
"This child is what I was meant to find on this journey," he thought as he took the baby into his arms.
Even if what he was about to do opposed the will of the world itself, he was unafraid.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
The old adventurer died from severe injuries before being able to tell this story, leaving only the child he had saved.
On his deathbed, he only managed four final words: "will," "adventure," and "final treasure."
Several single, childless, old adventurers in the Adventurers' Guild in Mondstadt raised the child as their own and named him Bennett.
Being raised by the Guild, Bennett referred to everyone as "Dad."
"Dad, your dentures fell into the bowl!", "Dad, you should stop wearing that old leather armor. Where are the undergarments I bought you?", "Dad, it's raining, better keep your distance from me so you don't get struck by lightning!"
Taking care of all his aging dads who have no family has taken up most of his time outside of adventuring.
"The dads certainly have found a treasure, haha!"
Cyrus, the current Guild Master, laughed, giving Bennett a pat on the back.
Though he is unlucky himself, he can at least try to bring luck to those he cares about. At least, that's how Bennett feels.
Bennett the Unlucky still strives to find his own lucky treasure through his series of unfortunate events.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5</color>
Oz the Raven, Fischl's familiar, said Bennett is "the most tenacious young man in the world."
Indeed, Bennett's share of bad luck throughout his life can be seen from his scars, old and new.
Attacked by monsters, buried in collapsed ruins, falling from cliffs... A wealth of "unfortunate events" has taught Bennett how to deal with more of them in the future.
Barbara, the Deaconess at the Church of Favonius, was once surprised by how skilled Bennett is at treating dislocated joints.
Another gift from his ordeals is his jaw-dropping talent for combat.
"Look at his moves... Doesn't that hurt?" Grand Master Varka of the Knights was extremely intrigued after seeing Bennett in combat.
It's not that Bennett doesn't feel pain — he has simply gotten used to it. He adapted to the pain as others would to pungent smells or blinding light.
Therefore, the way Bennett dives into battles head-on without reservation has become something of a signature of his.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
What does death mean, exactly? Always walking the thin line between life and death, Bennett can't help but wonder.
Bennett knows that the old adventurer who saved him has left many praiseworthy stories and legends after his death.
He knows that an adventurer will not have weeping at their funerals, only toasts made in their names by old comrades.
He knows, to the adventurers of Mondstadt, a "good death" comes at the end of a life given to the pursuit of treasure and the secrets of the world. Once over, their souls are brought back to their homeland by Barbatos.
He once feared death.
However, after pondering on this matter some more, he now feels death may be something fortunate for an adventurer...
Not that fortune has anything to do with him.
"Onto the next treasure!" And with that, Bennett puts this thinking business behind him.

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4</color>
Whenever he suffers severe injuries such as fractures or excessive loss of blood, Bennett will go to the Cathedral to seek treatment from Deaconess Barbara.
"Sorry, it's me again..." Bennett will say, scratching the back of his head.
Barbara, however, will just shake her head, and with a "let's deal with those scratches as well," she will toss him some adhesive bandages.
Such displays of concern may be inadvertent, but they have a special place in Bennett's heart. He sticks those bandages on his wounds with the care of one pinning a medal to their chest, before thanking her wholeheartedly.
Bennett keeps many such bandages in his utility pouch when he goes on adventures. Ones he gets from his dads, from Barbara, from Katheryne... and from adventurers he sometimes meets by chance after getting injured.
These tiny tokens of goodwill form a tangible collection of fair fortune unique to Bennett.
"Well, since everyone's by my side, I guess I'm not that unlucky after all."

<color=#ffd780>Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6</color>
Bennett's passion for adventure is unstoppable.
He wants to constantly explore, challenge, sweat it out, and eventually grow old on the adventurer's path.
But there was once when he met with a true crisis.
Just as that old adventurer had so long ago, Bennett was in a predicament that would cause any other person to despair.
"Losing this much blood... Not good."
But Bennett did not stop. "There's no reason to turn back," he thought.
Somehow, he just knew that all the agonizing misfortune he had suffered up till this point was for the sake of overcoming this precarious position.
But at the end of his hellish journey, what he found at the end was — nothing at all.
"Ha, returning empty-handed is... part of an adventure. I... don't mind..."
At last, his tightly-wound emotions came loose, allowing his many injuries to rob him of his consciousness, and he collapsed.
When he reawakened, he found that his wounds had been cauterized by a mysterious flame, stopping both the bleeding and the pain.
A jewel pulsed warmly in the palm of his hand, its rhythm in time with the heartbeat in his chest — the beating heart of an adventurer.
This was not the mercy of the world, or that fate took pity on him. Rather, this was his "final reward," one befitting a person with Bennett's burning passion.
<color=#ffd780>Fantastic Voyage</color> 's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.
When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Passion Overload</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of <color=#ffd780>Passion Overload</color> 's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

Increases the Level of <color=#ffd780>Fantastic Voyage</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside <color=#ffd780>Fantastic Voyage</color> 's radius gain a 15% <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> and their weapons are infused with <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> .

textualResearch.title: [Of Ballads and Brews] Bennett, Fecund Hamper

desc.text:
Clue
There is a small shoal in the Whispering Wood near Cider Lake where a small pier lies. I have placed my present in that area. (The road there is somewhat bumpy, so be careful not to fall.)
Message
Thanks for finding the gift that I left here!
Solving puzzles, avoiding traps, completing challenges, collecting precious rewards... These are my favorite things! It's quite rare that I get this kind of chance, so I hid my treasure somewhere out in the wild before designing a little quest around it. I hope it didn't bring you too much trouble.
This treasure is yours — good luck in your future endeavors!
Bennett, Adventurer
Item
Storefront Furnishing: Please, Enjoy Your Meal, 20,000 Mora, Agnidus Agate Fragment ×2

Message
"I am an official member of the Adventurer's Guild! Ad astra abyssosque, towards the stars and the abyss! Isn't it a wonderful motto!"
"But, I don't understand why. I've been unlucky my whole life. I wasn't like the others, I never went out there looking for an adventure, all I ever did was stay at home and do nothing, but even then, the adventure would still come for me. Ha!"
"I can be annoying sometimes. All my fellow adventurers would tell me something along the lines of: "Just being around you is dangerous, I guess it's still to early for me to go on an adventure" and they eventually all left the guild, one by one."
"In the end. I'm the only one left to take care of the elders. It's not that I don't want to, it's just that doing everything alone can be hard sometimes..."
Cat's Tail's reply
If you feel burdened by the hardships of life, why not come to Cat's Tail and try our wine? In our tavern, adventurous tales are always popular. Who knows, you might even find another adventurer like you.

value.name: Teyvat Charred Egg
value.desc: Bennett's specialty. For some reason, every single fried egg is a little burnt around the edges. That said, the burnt crisp does lend a whole new flavor to the dish.

value.name: Bennett
value.desc:
"Trial by Fire" Bennett

Once you know that you will certainly lose, then you must certainly know the way to win.

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: This is your team? Cool... I like the vibe. I'm Bennett, leader of Benny's Adventure Team. Any chance we can team up? Please?

voice.title: Chat: Treasures
voice.desc: Let's go find some treasure!

voice.title: Chat: Adventures
voice.desc: No one's joined me on an adventure in ages. C'mon, let's go!

voice.title: Chat: Self-Deprecation
voice.desc: "Good things come to those who don't wait around!" That's what they say, anyway. Knowing my luck, the opposite is probably true for me...

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: It always rains when I go on an adventure.

voice.title: When Thunder Strikes
voice.desc: Don't stand too close to me, or you might get hit by lightning too.

voice.title: When the Sun Is Out
voice.desc: Weather's not bad today... Oh crud, I jinxed it! Now it's bound to rain.

voice.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
voice.desc: Careful! In this kind of wind, it's easy to get hit in the head by flying rocks.

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Morning! Where's the adventure at today?

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: I brought a sandwich. You want some? I'll give you hal- *choking* *spluttering* ...Phew. Sorry, nearly choked to death there!

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Hey, wanna go talk to my dads for a bit? They tell the best adventure stories!

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: You're headed off? Cool. It was awesome adventuring with you. We should totally do it again!

voice.title: About Bennett: Adventure Team
voice.desc: I'm the leader of Benny's Adventure Team — a rising star in the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild! ...Where are the others? Ah, haha, they're all on leave right now.

voice.title: About Bennett: Bad Luck
voice.desc: Eh, it's not as bad as you've heard! Everyone falls into a trapper's pit or gets hit on the head by a falling tree now and then, right?

voice.title: About Us: Teammates
voice.desc: Hahaha, you wish! Benny's Adventure Team has had no vacancies in ages... I mean, you must be spoiled for choice, right? Why'd you wanna join the unluckiest adventurer alive, anyway?

voice.title: About Us: Division of Labor
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

From now on, I'll distract the monsters and set off the traps while you grab the treasure. Sound good? ...You don't like it? Oh — don't worry about me getting injured! It's what I'm best at... And for you, it would be my pleasure!

voice.title: About Us: Dangerous Places
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

I think I get why you teamed up with me now. It's 'cause we're the same, you and I — we both like that adrenaline rush you get from being in dangerous situations. That's what makes adventuring so addictive!

voice.title: About the Vision
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Getting recognized by the gods was the last thing I expected, seeing as how I'm so unlucky all the time. But if the gods haven't given up on me, I guess that means I shouldn't give up on me either.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: Do you wanna come and see the view of Mondstadt from above some time? It's real pretty at night, when the city's all lit up and you can see the moon reflected on Cider Lake... Huh? From where? Haha, well, there was this one time when I got picked up by a tornado and ended up on this cliff way up high— Not interested? Oh, okay then, never mind.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: I actually quite like cabbage. It's not much to look at, but you can't imagine a world without it. You can grow it anywhere, it goes with everything, and the flavor never gets in the way. I dunno, there's something... nice about being ordinary.

voice.title: About Barbara
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

She's the best singer and dancer out there! I always go to watch her in concert after an adventure goes south — it really lifts my mood, chanting along with all the other fans, cheering her on. It's really kinda magical! It's no wonder she's so popular... Boy, if I had even half her popularity as leader of my adventure team...

voice.title: About Klee
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

She's a cute kid... but I have to keep my distance. Whenever she plays with me, her bombs always end up going off... It's not so much me I'm worried about, it would just be awful if something happened to Klee. The Knights of Favonius would never forgive me, that's for sure.

voice.title: About Fischl
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Oh yeah, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung from the world beyond! She's amazing. I keep asking her if we can go adventuring in her home world together, but each time I bring it up she sort of avoids the topic... She's probably just worried about my safety. Her home world sounds like a dangerous place, for sure.

voice.title: About Jean
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

I keep meaning to ask Master Jean for some help with the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild, but I don't know how to go about it. The Guild doesn't have as many rules and regulations as the Knights of Favonius, the dads and I are pretty laid back about everything. Pretty sure that attitude wouldn't fly with Jean though... I guess I should read up on the Knights' etiquette or something?

voice.title: About Varka
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

He's my role model! Talk about team leaders — he's the Grand Master! Leads the whole darn Knights of Favonius! How incredible do you have to be to do that!? Recently, though, I've been thinking that having a smaller Adventure Team isn't such a bad thing after all. I mean, if things got too busy in the team, I'd have no time to look after all my dads in the guild, would I? Yeah... Yeah, things are fine the way they are.

voice.title: About Razor
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Wolvendom guy! Looks a little on the feral side... doesn't talk much... but he's alright! We both love eating meat, so we got that in common. I sometimes cook some meat for him, and he teaches me how wolves communicate in return. Haha! You should join us next time!

voice.title: About Amber
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Oh, I know who you mean. The girl who's always charging around all over the place. She's always off adventuring in the wild, just like me... But if you ever see her near a cooking pot, you'll soon find a cloud of thick black smoke blowing in your direction, followed by the smell of burnt steak... Huh, maybe she was born unlucky too?

voice.title: About Noelle
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

Noelle's someone I've been watching for a while. She's really talented, and extremely hardworking. But somehow she's still a maid — the Knights of Favonius still haven't made her a knight. It's a shame, don't you think? Boy, if she switched to the Adventurers' Guild, she'd easily be one of the best there is.

voice.title: More About Bennett: I
voice.desc: Oh... you wanna know about me? Haha, I'm just your average adventurer. 'Cept I'm more unlucky than average. Anyway, I'm nothing compared to you — you're the star of all those legendary tales. What do I got to show for myself?

voice.title: More About Bennett: II
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 3

"The dads..." That's how I refer to all the older adventurers in Mondstadt. Apparently, I was an orphan kid that they rescued from the most perilous situation ever. How cool is that? I have such terrible luck all the time, and yet I was rescued against the odds and survived all this time. It's a miracle if you ask me.

voice.title: More About Bennett: III
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 4

You've, uh, noticed then... Heh. Yeah, Benny's Adventure Team has been me on my own for a long time now. Reason is, I have such bad luck that even the most benign of adventures end up turning into the adventure from hell, and no one wants to come with me... Do you feel the same way?

voice.title: More About Bennett: IV
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 5

I was born unlucky. That's just the way it is, and I've lived with it so long now that I'm just used to it. But you know what? Maybe it's a good thing. It means I know that whatever luck I do have left is gonna run out sooner rather than later... so I'd better make the most of my life while it lasts. You know, go on plenty of adventures, meet loads of people... I mean, if I didn't live like that, I may never have even met you! Can you imagine? Haha!

voice.title: More About Bennett: V
voice.desc:
Unlocks at Friendship Lv. 6

Time flies! We've been a team for a while now, haven't we? Anyway, I have a dream I wanna tell you about. Once the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild becomes the biggest branch in Teyvat, I wanna go adventuring all over the whole world! Benny's Adventure Team will be the greatest adventure team there ever was, because you and me are the greatest adventurers! ..."Since when?" Uh... I don't remember exactly when you signed onto Benny's Adventure Team. But whatever, it's just details, right?

voice.title: Bennett's Hobbies
voice.desc: I like all kinds of things, but most of all, I like adventures! One day, I'm gonna find the most valuable treasure in the whole world, and then my dads can have a better life... and the Mondstadt Adventurers' Guild will be back in business!

voice.title: Bennett's Troubles
voice.desc: Hmm... Well, if you really wanna know... When I have a bad day, I feel a bit glum. Like, it sucks when I come back empty-handed from an adventure, or when one of my dads' old injuries starts acting up. But... they're just small things, really. After a good night's sleep, I forget all about them. New day, new start! Haha!

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: Meat! Meat is the best sustenance there is. Chicken-Mushroom Skewers, Steaks, and Sweet Madames are all my specialties. You won't go hungry if you come adventuring with me, that's for sure!

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: You can't really afford to be picky as an adventurer. That said, I can't really handle spicy food. I find it hard to breathe after eating Jueyun Chilis, like the spice went right into my lungs. And there's no avoiding the diarrhea afterward... It's the devil's fruit, I say. Who knows where it came from?

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: I
voice.desc: Whoa, lucky me! Haha... Oh wait! Does that mean I just used all of my good luck for today...?

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: II
voice.desc: Literally everything you cook ends up tasting amazing. Ha, you're awesome!

voice.title: Receiving a Gift: III
voice.desc: Oh no... my stomach hurts...

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Happy birthday! Best of luck in the year ahead. Don't worry, bad luck isn't contagious! As long as I'm around, it'll be drawn to me and not you, so you're safe.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 1

I feel stronger in every sense! Just as unlucky as ever, though. Hahaha.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 2

I'm catching up with you, Traveler! One step at a time.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 4

Wow, check out all this power! How can I repay you, though? Hmm... Oh yeah! I know this Domain where there's a priceless treasure hidden somewhere inside! Let's go hit it up!

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc:
Unlocks at ascension phase 6

Thanks to your help, I should finally be able to keep everyone safe now. Hopefully, people's opinions of me will start to change. Once the unluckiest guy alive, with a million cuts and bruises to show it. Now, a dependable adventurer at long last! ...Heh, well, I—I can hope.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: Hah!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Let's light it up!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Get outta here!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: IV
voice.desc: Haah!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: V
voice.desc: Take cover!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: VI
voice.desc: Outta the way!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: Everybody stand back!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: I'm going in!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: Teamwork is dreamwork!

voice.title: Sprint Start: I
voice.desc: Adventure time!

voice.title: Sprint Start: II
voice.desc: Off we go!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: Now that's what I call treasure!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Even better than I imagined! It's my lucky day!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: *chuckle* It's a miracle!

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: Shoot, I can't afford any more bandages...

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Don't worry. I got this.

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: I always bounce back, just watch me...

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: I
voice.desc: You're in over your head! Lemme try!

voice.title: Ally at Low HP: II
voice.desc: Hey, pick on someone your own size!

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: Benny's Adventure Team... I have failed you...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: This is just my luck...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Couldn't break... the curse...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Didn't see that coming.

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: That's gonna hurt in the morning...

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: II
voice.desc: Why do they never miss?

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: Y—You want me on your team?

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: I won't hold you back! ...Much.

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Gonna be epic!
